title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP discusses the Lakers reportedly being close to acquiring Patrick Beverley. Are there moves on the horizon in Tinseltown? Peter King discusses the likelihood that the Browns will stick with Jacoby Brissett as their starter in Deshaun Watson's absence. And LA Time columnist Dan Woike shares whether he thinks the Lakers will move Russell Westbrook any time soon. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP discusses the Lakers reportedly being close to acquiring Patrick Beverley. Are there moves on the horizon in Tinseltown? Peter King discusses the likelihood that the Browns will stick with Jacoby Brissett as their starter in Deshaun Watson's absence. And LA Time columnist Dan Woike shares whether he thinks the Lakers will move Russell Westbrook any time soon. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
